original_text: So this is what the Almighty Lord says to you, Oholibah: “Listen to me! I will cause your lovers to become angry with you. The lovers that you turned away from will come to attack you. I will bring them from every direction to attack you.
korean_text: 그러므로 오홀리바야 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 나는 네가 사랑하다가 싫어하던 자들을 충동하여 그들이 사방에서 와서 너를 치게 하리니

sentences.original_text: So this is what the Almighty Lord says to you, Oholibah:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 이것이 전능하신 주께서 오홀리바에게 하시는 말씀입니다:

sentences.original_text: I will cause your lovers to become angry with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신의 연인들이 당신에게 화나게 할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The lovers that you turned away from
I will bring them from every direction
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 모든 방향에서 데려올 것입니다
